---
title: "DataVis"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
  library(ggplot2)
  a <- c(1,2,3,2,3,4,5,4)
  b <- c(4,3,4,3,2,1,2,3)
  plot_df <- data.frame(a,b)
  ggplot(plot_df, aes(x=a,y=b)) + geom_point(size=2) + geom_smooth(method=lm)

```
